name: Mutate them!
description:
Grab your enemies and Mutate them!

Mutate your enemies to beat them and continue to the next wave.

To help your game you can mutate the enemies to use abilities.

There are 5 abilities

  • Ally(yellow)
  • Bomb(grey)
  • Teleport(purple)
  • Shield(cyan)
  • Heal(lime)

The goal of this game is to beat as many waves as possible. My record is 32 waves.

WASD - move

LEFT CLICK - grab

RIGHT CLICK - use

Have fun!
